name: エステティック56709 (Raining Sideways)
description:
Find the exit in a world of pure aesthetic where the rules keep changing and the goal is never clear. This game was made at the VGDC 2017 game jam, the theme for which was Distortion.

Move left and right with the arrow keys and jump with the space bar.

I made the main theme, a vaporwave remix of the song Telephone Number by Junko Ohashi.

Aesthetic Theme: https://soundcloud.com/raining-sideways/aesthetic-theme

Original Song: www.youtube.com/watch?v=0sFTGo8jFR8
